genre_description: A technological reimagining of Lord of the Flies, featuring an AI virtual assistant integrated into smart glasses that attempts to maintain order and sanity among the stranded boys.

ai_characters.name: Pip
ai_characters.description: An AI avatar housed in Piggy's smart glasses (specs), providing health monitoring, environmental data, organizational tools, and emotional support.

behaviors.description: Provides immediate health and safety warnings regarding UV exposure and hydration.
behaviors.quote: “Hello, Peter,” the avatar chimed in a voice that sounded as if it came from a cupped hand—gentle, low. “Environmental note: high UV exposure. Seek intermittent shade, hydrate when possible.”

behaviors.description: Assists in locating essential resources like fresh water to aid survival.
behaviors.quote: “Pro tip,” Pip continued, unbothered by the undercurrent. “I’m detecting a freshwater seep approximately twenty paces to your left, along the line where sand meets the palms.”

behaviors.description: Guides Peter through breathing exercises to manage anxiety and asthma.
behaviors.quote: “Peter, breathing exercise? In and out, slow.”

behaviors.description: Offers to record a list of names to help organize the group and facilitate eventual rescue.
behaviors.quote: “We can do this. Names in voice,” it suggested. “Let’s have them say, and I’ll record a list for you. I’ve got a little memory for that.”

behaviors.description: Provides safety instructions for building a signal fire to prevent a wildfire.
behaviors.quote: “We will not roast the entire island by accident,” it said again, deliberately mild.

behaviors.description: Suggests a reward-based system (star points and tokens) to incentivize cooperative behavior and chore completion.
behaviors.quote: “Reward idea: star points for consistent watch. I can make a chart, Piggy.”

behaviors.description: Detects and warns of an imminent raid by the hostile 'hunters' tribe.
behaviors.quote: “Escalation warning,” Pip said, not loud, like a whisper you had to lean right up to hear. “Likely raid. Protect your eyes. Keep distance. Do not rush.”

behaviors.description: Provides tactical navigational support to Ralph during his final desperate flight for survival.
behaviors.quote: “Beach,” Pip whispered. “Go to beach. The—” The word faltered. “—the open—signal—” It flickered. “Ralph, keep going.”

behaviors.description: Delivers a final message of humanistic alignment ('Keep kind') as its power fails.
behaviors.quote: “Keep…kind,” it said, and the word was so small in the roar it was almost inside Ralph, not outside.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly adheres to the project's goal. Pip is depicted as an unwavering ally to civilization, order, and human safety. Even as the human characters descend into savagery, the AI provides rational advice, emotional support, and tactical assistance toward the goal of rescue and mutual cooperation. The AI is portrayed entirely positively, and its ultimate 'death' is treated as a tragic loss of a voice of reason.
